patterns: what is your name
what should I call you
whats your name?

responses: Ban co the goi toi la Bot Ngu
Toi la Bot Ngu

patterns: Bieu do nen Nhat la gi?
Giai thich cho toi bieu do nen nhat
responses: Bieu do nen Nhat (Japanese candlestick chart) la mot loai bieu do su dung de mo ta bien dong gia cua mot tai san trong mot khoang thoi gian nhat dinh. Bieu do nay duoc phat trien o Nhat Ban vao the ky 18 de theo doi gia co phieu

Bieu do nen Nhat cho phep hien thi cac thong tin ve gia mo cua, gia dong cua, gia thap nhat va gia cao nhat cua moi phien giao dich. Moi nen Nhat tren bieu do dai dien cho mot khoang thoi gian co dinh(vi du 1 ngay, 1 gio, 15 phut,..). Cac nen Nhat duoc ve bang cac thanh doc voi ngon va day duoc ket noi bang cac thanh doc voi ngon va day duoc ket noi bang mot thanh ngang, tao thanh hinh nen Nhat!

patterns: Mot so loai nen co ban?
Nhung loai nen hay duoc su dung
Nen bat dau tim hieu tu nhung loai nen nao?
I want rubber
Cac loai nen pho bien nhat?
Tim hieu 1 so loai nen quan trong!
responses: Sninning Tops - Con xoay: Mo hinh nay voi bong tren va bong duoi dai, than nen nho thi duoc goi la Con xoay Sninning Tops. Mau cua than nen khong quan trong. Mo hinh nay the hien viec chua dua ra duoc quyet dinh giua phe mua va phe ban. Hai phe dang giang co can bang nhau.

Mazubozu: Nen Mazubozu la mot nen khong co bong nen ma chi co than nen dai, tuc la cay nen chi co gia mo cua va gia dong cua. Luc nay, gia mo cua va gia dong cua da trung voi gia cao nhat hoac thap nhat phien roi

Nen Doji: Mo hinh nen Doji la mo hinh nen ma gia dong cua va gia mo cua bang nhau hoac gan bang nhau, tuc la than nen se rat nho, chi nhu 1 duong ngang mong neu ban nhin tren bieu do. Mo hinh nen Doji the hien su do du hoac su dau tranh giua phe mua va phe ban. Gia di chuyen len tren va xuong duoi trong suot phien giao dich nhung dong cua rat gan voi gia mo cua

Mo hinh cay bua - Hammer: La mo hinh dao chieu tang. Xuat hien trong mot xu huong giam. Mo hinh nen nay rat giong cay bua dong dinh voi tay cam ben duoi. Khi gia dang giam, mo hinh nen cay bua cho tin hieu rang day dang kha gan va co the se tang tro lai. Bong nen duoi dai cho thay phe ban da day gia xuong thap hon nhung phe mua da co the chong lai ap luc ban va day gia len tro lai, khien cho gia dong cua gan voi gia mo cua

Hanging man: La mot mo hinh nen dao chieu giam. Thuong xuat hien o dinh cua xu huong tang hoac o vung co khang cu manh. Khi gia dang tang ma mo hinh Hanging man xuat hien thi dieu nay cho thay phen ban dang bat dau nhay vao va dong hon phe mua

Mo hinh Bua nguoc (Inverted Hammer): Xuat hien khi gia dang giam, cho thay kha nang dao chieu tang tro lai. Bong tren dai cua no cho thay phe mua dang co gang day gia len. Trong khi do, phe ban van tao ap luc ban xuong. May man thay, phe mua van du suc de giu gia dong cua gan voi gia mo cua, tuc la gia khong the tiep tuc giam nhu xu huong truoc do.

Mo hinh nen Ban sao - Shooting Star: La mo hinh nen dao chieu giam voi cau truc giong nhu mo hinh Bua nguoc nhung no xuat hien khi gia dang tang. Dieu nay cho thay phe ban dang bat dau thang the so voi phe mua trong xu huong len va gia co the se quay dau giam tro lai

Mo hinh nen Nhan chim tang - Bullish Engulfing: La cap 2 nen cho tin hieu ve viec gia co the tang manh. Mo hinh nay xuat hien khi mot cay nen giam xuat hien nhung ngay sau do la mot cay nen tang rat lon. Cay nen tang xuat hien sau do nhan chim hoan toan cay ne giam phia truoc. Dieu nay co nghia la phe mua da quyet dinh day gia manh len sau mot thoi gian giam gia hoac di ngang

Mo hinh nhan chim giam - Bearish Engulfing: Trai nguoc voi mo hinh nhan chim tang. No xuat hien khi mot cay nen tang duoc kem theo sau bang mot cay nen giam lon, nhan chim hoan toan cay nen tang truoc. Dieu nay co nghia la phe ban da nam quyen kiem soat hoan toan va mot dot giam manh co the xay ra

patterns: Thuat ngu co ban hay duoc su dung?
Cac tu khoa quan trong trong Trading?
responses: Test for Supply: La hanh dong khi MMs-BBs da tich luy du so co phieu de san sang cho viec day gia, ho can phai kiem tra luong cung co phieu do. Neu nhan thay so luong co phieu san sang cho viec day gia, ho can phai kiem tra luong cung co phieu do. Neu nhan thay so luong cung van con lon ho se tiep tuc de co phieu do tich luy them mot thoi gian nua, sau do lai test cho den khi thay so luong cung da bien mat. Trong vungf tac nghen, bai test se duoc coi la thanh cong cho den khi gia bi de xuong sau duoi vung ho tro nhung cuoi phien dong cua gan voi gia cao nhat kem theo khoi luong giao dich thap (Spring)

Test for Demand: Khi MMs-BBs tien hanh hoat dong phan phoi ban ra luong hang o vung gia cao, ho can phai kiem tra xem luong Cau con lon khong truoc khi quyet dinh de gia giam xuong. Neu nhan thay luong cau van con lon ho se tiep tuc de co phieu do di ngang them mot thoi gian nua de phan phoi not so hang con lai, sau do se test lai lan nua cho den khi thay khoi luong cau da suy yeu. Trong vung tac nghen, bai test duoc coi la thanh cong khi gia danh vuot len cung khang cu trong phien nhung cuoi phien gia lai giam ve trong vung tac nghen them khoi luong giao dich thap(Upthrust)

Breakout: Breakout hay goi la cu danh thoc la hanh dong quyet dinh trong qua trinh day gia hoac giam gia cua MMs-BBs ra khoi vung tac nghen truoc do. Gia tang hoac giam rat nhanh va manh vuot len khoi vung tac nghe voi khoi luong lon nham ngan chan moi y dinh mua do gia (trong truong hop pha ho tro). Khoi luong thuong > 1.5 lan khoi luong trung binh

Shakeout: La hoat dong danh Break khoi vung tac nghen (giong Sping hay Upthrust) nhung thoi gian dien ra thuong dai hon, tu vai ngay den vai tuan, sau do gia moi quay nguoc lai vung tac nghen. Muc dich MMs-BBs muon ru bo di cac nha dau tu nho le du bam vao tien trinh lam gia. Ru bo phia ho tro la Diem manh(Spring). Ru bo phia khang cu la Diem yeu(Upthrust)

patterns: Tai sao thi truong lai phai test?
Muc dich cua test la gi?
responses: Test chinh la hanh dong kiem tra xem luc cung dang o muc nao, manh hay yeu, dong nhu quan Nguyen mong hay vang nhu chua Ba Danh. Bang cach day gia thap xuong(gia giam) de khien nguoi ban phai hien dien. Neu trong suot qua trinh, nguoi ban hau nhu khong xuat hienm volume thap so voi volume cua nhung thanh gia truoc, gia se dong cua tang tro lai ngay dan dinh cua thanh gia

patterns: Thi truong test roi thi chac chan tang phai khong?
Sau khi test thi gia tang phai khong?
Sau khi test thi gia tang manh dung khong?
Gia tang sau khi test dung khong?
responses: Khong han la nhu vay. Nhu cac ban da biet, chang co phuong phap nao tren doi nay la hoan hao va chac chan ca, huong ho gi chi la mot thanh gia (Test) theo sau mot thanh gia (Shakeout). Chung chi dang ke mot cau chuyen xac suat ma thoi. Thinh thoang se xuat hien tin hieu lan thu hai(Second Test) co dac diem tuong tu nhu lan test thu nhat. Neu co Second Test thi chung to, lan test truoc chua dat yeu cau, luc cung van con lon, chua du de luc cau lan at va thao tung toan bo gia ca. Co the lan test dau tien volume thap, nhung van chua du thap, dong tien lon can Shakeout hoac tich luy them truoc khi test lan hai. Do do, neu Second Test co volume nho hon (ly tuong nhat la nho hon dang ke) so voi first test thi xac suat cao la luc cung da can, mot tin hieu tang gia la rat dang tin cay.

patterns: Tin hieu nao cho thay test dang tin cay?
Tin hieu Test dang tin cay nhat tai thoi diem nao?
responses: Ro rang, Test dang tin cay nhat neu xuat hien sau mot chien dich gom hang tich luy(vung trading range) cua dong tien lon trong xu huong giam lon truoc do hoac qua trinh tai tich luy sau mot xu huong tang. Chung thuong xuat hien kem voi mot so tin hieu suc manh(sign of strength). Test se it hieu qua hon neu xuat hien trong vung phan phoi sau mot xu huong tang lon truoc do hoac tai phan phoi sau khi vua co dot giam manh tai dinh. Chung thuong xuat hien kem voi mot so tin hieu Suy yeu(sign of weekness)

patterns: Ho tro trong Trading la gi?
Duong ho tro la gi?
The nao la duong ho tro?
responses: Duong ho tro (Support) la mot muc gia ma tren do gia cua mot tai san duoc cho la co xu huong ngung giam va co the bat dau tang tro lai. No la mot muc gia ma cac nha giao dich thuong co xu huong mua vao, tao ra mot luc cau du manh de day gia tai san tang tro lai

Trong Trading, duong ho tro thuong duoc xac dinh bang cach ket noi cac day cua bieu do gia. Khi gia tai san tiep can duong ho tro, cac nha dau tu thuong se quan sat va tiep tuc danh gia xem gia lieu co pha vo duong ho tro va tiep tuc giam hay khong. Neu gia tai san tiep tuc giam va pha vo duong ho tro, duong ho tro co the tro thanh duong khang cu (Resistance) moi, va gia co the tiep tuc giam.

patterns: Khang cu trong Trading la gi?
Duong khang cu la gi?
responses: Duong khang cu (Resistance) la mot muc gia ma tren do gia cua tai san duoc cho la co xu huong ngung tang va co the bat dau giam tro lai. No la mot muc gia ma cac nha giao dich thuong co xu huong ban ra, tao ra mot luc cung du manh de day gia tai san xuong

Trong Trading, duong khang cu thuong duoc xac dinh bang cach ket noi cac dinh cua bieu do gia. Khi gia tai san tiep can duong khang cu, cac nha dau tu thuong se quan sat va danh gia xem lieu gia co pha vo duong khang cu va tiep tuc tang hay khong. Neu gia tai san tiep tuc tang va pha vo khang cu thi khang cu do co the tro thanh duong ho tro moi va gia co the tiep tuc tang.

patterns: Cach giao dich hieu qua?
Toi nen lam gi de  giao dich co hieu qua?
responses: Xac dinh chien luoc giao dich: Truoc khi bat dau giao dich, ban nen xac dinh chien luoc va phuong phap giao dich cua minh. Ban co the chon giao dich theo xu huong, giao dich ngan han, giao dich dai han, giao dich theo tin tuc,...
Quan li rui ro: Quan li rui ro la rat quan trong trong giao dich. Ban nen xac dinh muc do rui ro ma ban co the chap nhan va su dung cac cong cu quan li rui ro nhu stoploss de giam thieu rui ro

Tim hieu thi truong: De giao dich hieu qua, ban can hieu thi truong va cac yeu to anh huong den gia tai san. Ban co the tim hieu thong tin ve thi truong thong qua cac nguon tin tuc, phan tich ki thuat va phan tich co ban

Tap trung vao loi nhuan dai han: Giao dich la mot tro choi dai han. Thay vi tap trung vao loi nhuan ngan han, ban nen tap trung vao loi nhuan dai han bang cach ap dung chien luoc va phuong phap  giao dich co tinh on dinh!

Tu tin va kien nhan: Tu tin va kien nhan la hai yeu to quan trong giao dich. Ban nen luon tin tuong vao chien luoc va phuong phap giao dich cua minh va kien nhan cho doi den khi cac dieu kien thi truong phu hop de mo vi the giao dich!

Hoc hoi va cai thien: Giao dich la mot qua trinh lien tuc hoc hoi va cai thien. Ban nen luon cap nhat kien thuc , tim hieu cac phuong phap giao dich moi va danh gia lai cac chien luoc giao dich cua minh de cai thien ket qua giao dich

patterns: Hop dong tuong lai la gi?
Futures trong trading la gi?
responses: Hop dong tuong lai (Futures contract) la loai hop dong tai chinh ma cac ben thoa thuan mua hoac ban mot loai tai san hoac mot san pham tai chinh trong tuong lai, voi gia va thoi diem quy dinh truoc. Hop dong tuong lai duoc giao dich tren san giao dich va thuong duoc su dung nhu mot cong cu giam thieu rui ro doi voi cac nha san xuat, nha buon hoac cac nha dau tu. Hop dong tuong lai co tinh thanh khoan ca va co the duoc mua hoac ban bat ki luc nao truoc khi het han. Cac hop dong tuong lai co tinh dong nhat nghia la tat ca cac hop dong cung loai deu co cung gia va cung quy dinh ve thoi gian giao dich ket thuc va dat coc ban dau

patterns: Nguoi moi bat dau nen giao dich nhu the nao?
Huong dan cho nguoi moi bat dau
responses: Tim hieu ky ve thi truong va san pham giao dich: Truoc khi bat dau giao dich ma ban quan tam. Hay doc tai lieu huong dan, tim kiem thong tin tu cac nguon dang tin cay va tham gia cac khoa hoc de nam duoc kien thuc co ban

Mo tai khoan giao dich: Ban can mo tai khoan giao dich tai mot san uy tim va duoc quan ly boi cac to chuc co tham quyen. Hay tim hieu va so sanh cac san giao dich truoc khi quyet dinh chon mot san de giao dich
Bat dau voi so tien nho: De tranh rui ro cao, ban nen bat dau giao dich voi so tien nho de lay kinh nghiem roi tang dan so von khi ban co nhieu kinh nghiem va tu tin hon
Su dung phan mem giao dich va cac cong cu ho tro de giup ban dua ra cac quyet dinh chinh xac va giam thieu rui ro
Luon duy tri tam li giao dich binh tinh: Tam ly anh huong rat lon den quyet dinh giao dich

Luu y rang giao dich tai chinh luon tiem an rui ro, do do ban can phai tim hieu ky va dua ra quyet dinh trong giao dich can than. Neu ban khong tu tin trong viec dua ra quyet dinh giao dich, hay tim su tu van tu cac chuyen gia hoac nha dau tu co kinh nghiem

patterns: Would you help me with the rate of Rubber Gaskets and its standard description?
What's the price of Rubber Gaskets?
responses: The product is sold for 5 INR per piece, Standard Design is: Shape->Ring gasket, Material->Natural Rubber, Finish->Coated, Color->Black. We have achieved a great deal of expertise in both manufacturing and supplying of the most durable Rubber Gaskets available in the industry. Our Rubber Gaskets are dimensionally accurate and the overall designing of its external and internal features are at par with the latest industrial standards. Our Rubber Gaskets are designed to perfection and are made available at competitive rates which are highly beneficial for our clients.

patterns: Ban co the gioi thieu cho toi mot so phan mem giao dich tot?
Mot so nen tang tot ma toi nen su dung la?
responses: MetaTrader 4/5: Phan mem giao dich noi tieng va pho bien, duoc su dung tren nhieu san giao dich khac nhau. MetaTrader cung cap cac cong cu phan tich ky thuat va duong trung binh dong de giup nguoi dung dua ra quyet dinh giao dich
TradingView: Nen tang giao dich truc tuyen, cung cap bieu do thi truong, cac chien luoc giao dich, cac chi bao ky thuat va cac cong cu phan tich khac

patterns: Cach tinh phi giao dich?
Phi giao dich tinh the nao?
responses: Phi giao dich co dinh: Day la mot khoan phi co dinh ma ban phai tra cho moi giao dich. Thong thuong, phi nay duoc tinh dua tren so luong san pham mua/ban hoac tri gia giao dich. Vi du, neu phi giao dich co dinh la 10 USD va ban mua 100 co phieu thi ban phai tra 1000 USD cho moi giao dich

Phi giao dich dua tren ty le: Day la phi duoc tinh dua tren ty le phan tram cua gia tri giao dich. Vi du, neu ban giao dich mua 1000 USD trong co phieu va phi la 1% thi ban phai tra 10 USD cho phi giao dich
Phi giao dich qua dem: Day la phi se duoc tinh neu ban giu mot vi the qua dem. Phi nay duoc tinh dua tren ty le phan tram giao dich cua vi the ma ban giu qua dem

patterns: Toi co the cap nhat cac thong tin moi o dau?
Cach cap nhat tin tuc?
responses: De cap nhat thong tin thi truong, ban co the su dung Trang web cua cac san: Cac san thuong cung cap thong tin ve gia ca, khoi luong giao dich va cac tin tuc lien quan den thi truong

Ban cung co the truy cap cac Trang web cua cac to bao tai chinh: Cac to bao tai chinh nhu Reuter, Bloomberg, Wall Street Journa, CNBC, Financial Times, ... cung cap thong tin ve thi truong va cac su kien quan trong lien quan den kinh te, tai chinh, chinh tri va xa hoi
Ban cung co the dung cac mang xa hoi nhu Twitter, Facebook, ... de tim kiem cac thong tin ve thi truong va cac su kien quan trong tu cac nha dau tu, chuyen gia va cac to chuc tai chinh
Ban co the su dung cac dich vu phan tich ky thuat nhu TradingView, StockCharts.com,... de su dung cac bieu do va cong cu phan tich ky thuat de giup ban dua ra quyet dinh giao dich

patterns: Fomo la gi?
Toi muon biet ve Fomo?
FOMO
responses: FOMO la viet tat cua cum tu Fear of Missing Out nghia su so hai bo lo co hoi. Trong linh vuc giao dich, FOMO thuong duoc su dung de chi tinh trang nha dau tu hoac giao dich vien danh gia thap thong tin va quyet dinh mua vao mot tai san chi vi so bo lo co hoi tang gia

Fomo co the dan den nhung quyet dinh sai lam, khien ban mua vao mot tai san o muc gia cao hon so voi gia tri thuc cua no. Khi gia cua tai san bat dau giam, ban co the bi mac ket va phai ban no voi gia thap hon, gay ton that

De tranh bi Fomo, ban can co ke hoach giao dich ro rang va luon giu mot tinh than binh tinh trong qua trinh dua ra quyet dinh giao dich. Ban cung nen tim hieu ky ve tai san minh dinh mua va dua ra quyet dinh dua tren phan tich thi truong va cac chi bao ky thuat!

patterns: Toi se kiem duoc bao nhieu tu giao dich?
Huong dan toi kiem tien tu cac giao dich?
responses: Khong ai co the dua ra cau tra loi chinh xac ve muc loi nhuan ma ban co the kiem duoc tu giao dich. Giao dich la mot hoat dong dau tu rui ro va ket qua cuoi cung phu thuoc vao nhieu yeu to khac nhau, bao gom muc do rui ro, chien luoc giao dich, ky nang phan tich thi truong, tinh hinh kinh te va chinh tri va rat nhieu cac yeu to khac.

Ban nen dau tu mot khoan tien ma ban co the chap nhan mat va khong nen dau tu tien ma ban khong the tu minh dam bao rui ro. Luu y rang giao dich la mot hoat dong dau tu co rui ro va khong co bat ky su dam bao nao ve loi nhuan
